channel.title: Talks By Gardner H. Russell
channel.description: General Conference talks by Gardner H. Russell.

item.title: Touching the Hearts of Less-Active Members
item.description: I think it’s wonderful to have a calm exterior; I didn’t know my heart could beat quite this hard. I am thrilled to be a member of the Mexico/Central America Area Presidency. You’ve heard from all three of us today: Elder Gene R. Cook in the prayer,

item.title: The Call—An Eternal Miracle
item.description: The other day, as I watched the videotape my eyes moistened in instant tenderness as each new missionary opened and read aloud with his family the official call to a full-time mission, signed by the President of the Church. I recalled my own mission
